title: Want detailed consultation for your project?
subtitle: Tell us about your task, and our experts will propose optimal AI solution considering your business specifics
description: We'll respond within 2 hours during business hours and provide detailed project evaluation

timeline.label: Desired Timeline
timeline.placeholder: When do you plan to launch the project?

description.label: Task Description
description.placeholder: Describe your business task that you want to solve with AI. The more detailed - the more accurately we can evaluate the project and propose a solution.
description.error_min_length: Description must contain at least 50 characters

current_solution.label: Current Solution
current_solution.placeholder: How is this task currently solved in your company?

data_available.label: Data Availability
data_available.placeholder: Do you have data for model training?

newsletter.label: Subscribe to AI technology news
newsletter.description: We'll send interesting cases and technology updates

demo.label: Want to see demo of similar solution
demo.description: We'll show examples of implemented projects

success.title: Request Sent!
success.message: We received your request and will respond within 2 hours during business hours.
next_steps: Our expert will study your task
success.contact_info: If you have urgent questions, call: +996 312 123-456

privacy_notice: By submitting the form, you agree to personal data processing according to our privacy policy

methods.label: Office
methods.description: Come for a cup of coffee

questions.question: How much does AI solution development cost?
questions.answer: Cost depends on project complexity and starts from $50,000. Use our calculator for preliminary estimate.

questions.question: What are the development timelines?
questions.answer: Simple solutions - 1-3 months, complex systems - 4-12 months. Exact timelines are determined after requirements analysis.

questions.question: Is special data needed?
questions.answer: Yes, data is needed for training AI models. We'll help prepare data or find alternative sources.

questions.question: Do you provide technical support?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer various support levels from basic to enterprise with 99.9% SLA.
